Posts.Content: i also had my first EC 21/2 weeks since with cold cap in the last few days i have lost small amount of hair only ,but no scalp tenderness ,my problem i s that i ended up with n in hospital for 5days  neutopenic sepsis at day 6 i a m so worried about my next treatment back to oncologist tuesday
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: can anyone help finished my chemo 3weeks ago been very unwell since last two, had two hospital admissions with infections just wondered when will i feel better still got no taste when will this come back ,fed up and will start rx next week.
Posts.Title: ***April 2019 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat***

Posts.Content: dear Ares i am also feeling concerned, i have just been diagnosed with lobuler cancer , i have already had mx and reconstuction for DCIS in 2013 but after the MRI scan it also show futher tumour in the lymph glands on the reconstucted side during my five year follow ups i have never had any scans,are anything on this side .is this normal practice. starting to feel grateful for having breast cancer for the second time (unrelated) .worried to be starting the journey again?
Posts.Title: Missed BC Diagnosis

Posts.Content: i feel  the same im going for my oncology app thursday probably start chemo very soon after.i have had two mx axillary clearence ,LD reconstruction on one side and in the process of expander reconstrution on the other side,so i have had everything but iam terrified of the chemo,just hope it cannot be as bad as i expect
Posts.Title: So anxious....

Posts.Content: hi i am having my 5th chemo on friday i have used the cold cap i have lost alot of hair especally on he top of my head, but still have a good amount left just wondering has anyone had a weave once chemo has finished and if so how long after.
Posts.Title: Hair returning - but should I get excited?

Posts.Content: i am having this op on thursday ,also total axillary node clearence on the other side,had had mx on this sde 5yrs ago but cancer is back and a new cancer on the other side i cannot help but feel im  not going to be able to do anything with drains in both sides.last time i also had L.D recustuction i didnt want that this time ? just getting myself in a panic about everything
